name: zone_tuning_no_gravity_half_recovery
description: Removed zone gravity + halved recovery modifiers. Tests whether weaker recovery alone creates better zone distribution.
hypothesis: Without gravity drag and with weaker recovery, players should spend more time in medium/high bands (target: baseline 60-70%, medium 15-25%)
